items.name: step-indicator
items.title: Step Indicator
items.description: A clean step indicator component showing numbered circles with checkmarks for completed steps. Supports horizontal and vertical orientations.

items.name: wizard-stepper
items.title: Wizard Stepper
items.description: A full-featured wizard stepper with titles and descriptions. Perfect for multi-step forms, checkout flows, and onboarding sequences.

items.name: progress-tracker
items.title: Progress Tracker
items.description: A progress tracking component with three variants: segmented bars, continuous progress bar, and dot indicators. Shows step X of Y labels.

items.name: milestone-stepper
items.title: Milestone Stepper
items.description: A vertical timeline-style stepper for showing milestones, order tracking, or project phases. Supports custom icons and multiple variants.

items.name: nav-stepper
items.title: Nav Stepper
items.description: A navigable stepper with previous/next buttons. Supports numbered, dot, and bar indicator variants with inline or bottom navigation positioning.

items.name: spark-chart
items.title: Spark Chart
items.description: An interactive sparkline with path-following indicator, dual-path color reveal, gradient fill, and draw-in animation. Pixel-perfect cursor tracking via binary search on SVG path length.

items.name: blurred-stagger-text
items.title: Blurred Stagger Text
items.description: An animated text component with staggered blur reveal effect using Framer Motion.

items.name: staggered-faq-section
items.title: StaggeredFAQSection
items.description: A responsive FAQ component with animated text reveals and customizable content.

items.name: animated-theme-toggler
items.title: Theme Toggler
items.description: Sun↔moon morph toggle with spring physics, SVG mask crescent, and switch-click audio.

items.name: feature-highlights
items.title: Feature Highlights
items.description: Progressive reveal feature list with sliding accent indicator, grid-template-rows expand, and staggered entrance.

items.name: faq-scroll-accordion
items.title: FAQ Scroll Accordion
items.description: Scroll-aware FAQ with center-zone detection via IntersectionObserver, auto-cascading open, staggered entrance, and grid-template-rows expand.

items.name: faq-auto-accordion
items.title: FAQ Auto Accordion
items.description: Spring-driven FAQ with a traveling accent bar (layoutId), spring height animation, blur-deblur text reveal, and layout FLIP repositioning.

items.name: faq-chat-accordion
items.title: FAQ Chat Accordion
items.description: Conversational FAQ with right/left message bubbles, typing indicator dots, spring message entrance, and layout FLIP repositioning.

items.name: accordion-editorial
items.title: Editorial Accordion
items.description: A typographic accordion with oversized uppercase titles, numbered items, and a faded-to-primary color transition on expand.

items.name: accordion-indexed
items.title: Indexed Accordion
items.description: A numbered accordion with zero-padded indices, a boxed plus icon that rotates on hover and transforms on expand.

items.name: avatar-spring-stack
items.title: Avatar Spring Stack
items.description: An overlapping avatar stack with spring-animated tooltips that reveal labels on hover, plus a +N overflow counter.

items.name: avatar-quick-actions
items.title: Avatar Quick Actions
items.description: An orbital action ring that blooms outward from the avatar with staggered spring emergence — hover any action and the rest dim, drawing the eye.

items.name: avatar-hover-card
items.title: Avatar Hover Card
items.description: An interactive avatar that reveals a profile card on hover with spring physics, staggered content, and delayed open/close.

items.name: variable-text
items.title: Variable Text
items.description: Cursor acts as a focal plane — characters near the pointer sharpen (heavier weight, slight lift, full opacity) while distant characters soften. Depth-of-field for typography.

items.name: scramble-text
items.title: Scramble Text
items.description: Hover triggers a decode sequence — characters dissolve into random glyphs then resolve in a directional wave that follows your entry point, each locking in with a spring pop.

items.name: card-carousel-hero
items.title: Card Carousel Hero
items.description: An interactive hero section featuring a card carousel with smooth animations

items.name: gradient-hero-showcase
items.title: Gradient Hero Showcase
items.description: A modern hero section with animated gradient background and smooth transitions

items.name: video-hero-showcase
items.title: Video Hero Showcase
items.description: A dynamic hero section featuring video backgrounds and interactive elements

items.name: split-feature-showcase
items.title: Split Feature Showcase
items.description: Scroll-triggered bento grid with spring-animated message preview and integration cards with ambient gradient glow.

items.name: product-feature-hero
items.title: Product Feature Hero
items.description: Two-column hero with decorative gradient card and a four-column feature highlights grid.

items.name: product-card-hero
items.title: Product Card Hero
items.description: Two-column hero with floating account menu card, pricing bar, and a four-column feature grid with icons.

items.name: integration-and-stats-section
items.title: Integration And Stats Section
items.description: Three-column feature cards with chat, analytics, and polling illustrations

items.name: rotating-gradient-right
items.title: Rotating Gradient Right
items.description: Rotating conic gradient animation with centered card content

items.name: automated-tasks-panel
items.title: Automated Tasks Panel
items.description: Animated task panel with scrolling automation features

items.name: trusted-clients-showcase
items.title: Trusted Clients Showcase
items.description: Spotlight logo grid with staggered blur-up entrance and collective dim hover.

items.name: client-carousel-showcase
items.title: Client Carousel Showcase
items.description: Infinite drift marquee with gradient edge masks — logos scroll continuously, pause on hover, and lift with exponential deceleration when focused.

items.name: auto-scrolling-client-carousel
items.title: Auto Scrolling Client Carousel
items.description: Dual ribbon with grayscale bloom — two rows scroll in opposite directions, monochrome at rest, color blooms on hover with spring-bounce lift.

items.name: footer-pro
items.title: Footer Pro
items.description: A minimal, typographic footer with brand wordmark, link columns, and quiet social icons.

items.name: corporate-footer
items.title: Corporate Footer
items.description: A card-based corporate footer with decorative watermark, column navigation, and whisper-quiet typography.

items.name: footer-enterprise
items.title: Footer Enterprise
items.description: An enterprise-grade footer with three-tier layout, wide column grid, and whisper-quiet typography.

items.name: wordmark-footer
items.title: Wordmark Footer
items.description: A Rauno-craft half-cut wordmark footer — giant brand text on a full-width dark surface with luminance gradient and hairline divider.

items.name: hover-gradient-navbar
items.title: Hover Gradient Navbar
items.description: A navigation bar with gradient hover effects and smooth transitions.

items.name: floating-navbar
items.title: Floating Navbar
items.description: A floating navigation bar that appears on scroll with smooth animations.

items.name: luma-bar
items.title: Luma Bar
items.description: A sleek navigation bar with Luma-inspired design and interactions.

items.name: promote-header
items.title: Promote Header
items.description: A promotional header component for announcements and marketing messages.

items.name: pricing-plans
items.title: Pricing Plans
items.description: A comprehensive pricing plans component with multiple tiers and features.

items.name: pricing-comparison
items.title: Pricing Comparison
items.description: A detailed pricing comparison table with features and plan differences.

items.name: subscription-plans
items.title: Subscription Plans
items.description: A subscription-focused pricing component with billing options and features.

items.name: pricing-flow
items.title: Pricing Flow
items.description: An interactive pricing flow with billing toggles and plan selection.

items.name: pricing-with-user-scaling
items.title: Pricing with User Scaling
items.description: A pricing component with user-based scaling and dynamic pricing calculations.

items.name: slide-to-delete-button
items.title: Slide To Delete Button
items.description: iOS 26 liquid-glass slide-to-confirm track with spring-physics draggable thumb.

items.name: glow-link-button
items.title: Glow Link Button
items.description: iOS 26 liquid-glass link pill with cursor-following radial glow and spring arrow.

items.name: circular-stepper-input
items.title: Circular Stepper Input
items.description: iOS 26 liquid-glass circular stepper with draggable ring, spring-animated arc, and haptic sound feedback.

items.name: color-picker-input
items.title: Color Picker Input
items.description: iOS 26 liquid-glass color picker with swatch grid, draggable opacity slider, and one-click copy.

items.name: gravatar-email-input
items.title: Gravatar Email Input
items.description: iOS 26 liquid-glass email input with live Gravatar avatar preview and smooth fade-in.

items.name: correct-number-input
items.title: Correct Number Input
items.description: iOS 26 liquid-glass number input with floating label, integrated stepper buttons, and haptic sound.

items.name: better-time-picker
items.title: Better Time Picker
items.description: iOS 26 liquid-glass time picker with column steppers, spring-animated values, and segmented AM/PM toggle.

items.name: inline-copy-input
items.title: Inline Copy Input
items.description: iOS 26 liquid-glass copy input with animated clipboard/check icon swap and haptic sound.

items.name: clean-tag-input
items.title: Clean Tag Input
items.description: iOS 26 liquid-glass tag input with spring-animated pill chips and keyboard-driven add/remove.

items.name: nested-dashboard-menu
items.title: Nested Dashboard Menu
items.description: A nested navigation menu component for dashboard layouts.

items.name: drawer-inner-content
items.title: Drawer Inner Content
items.description: Gesture-driven bottom sheet — drag to dismiss, spring physics, structured content sections with staggered cascade.

items.name: centered-feedback-drawer
items.title: Centered Feedback Drawer
items.description: Centered feedback panel — three SVG faces, contextual comment, spring selection, auto-dismiss thank-you state.

items.name: bottom-drawers
items.title: Bottom Drawers
items.description: Snap-point bottom sheet — three snap heights (peek, half, full), drag between them, velocity-aware, progressive content reveal.

items.name: input-with-select
items.title: Input With Select
items.description: iOS 26 liquid-glass amount input with integrated segmented currency/unit selector and spring-animated knob.

items.name: url-input
items.title: URL Input
items.description: iOS 26 liquid-glass URL input with live favicon preview, protocol hint, and globe fallback icon.

items.name: password-field
items.title: Password Field
items.description: iOS 26 liquid-glass password input with animated strength bar, validation checklist, and one-click generation.

items.name: notification
items.title: Notification
items.description: Spring toast stack with drag-to-dismiss, rubber-band physics, and glass morphism.

items.name: notifications-carousel
items.title: Notifications Carousel
items.description: Vertical drum carousel with 3D cylinder rotation, proximity brightness, and spring snap.

items.name: notifications-filter
items.title: Notifications Filter
items.description: Spring pill bar with layoutId sliding indicator and staggered item transitions.

items.name: glass-form
items.title: Glass Form
items.description: iOS 26 liquid-glass form system — grouped fields, toggles, segmented controls, and action buttons with backdrop blur.

items.name: motion-file-tree
items.title: Motion File Tree
items.description: An animated file tree component with smooth expand/collapse transitions.

items.name: magic-tree

items.description: A magical file tree with sparkle effects and interactive animations.

items.name: tree-node-tooltip
items.title: Tree Node Tooltip
items.description: A file tree component with tooltip support for each node.

items.name: event-scheduler

items.description: Inline timeline scheduler — tap a time, type a title, press Enter. Spring animations, sorted list, sound feedback.

items.name: glass-image-editor

items.description: iOS 26 liquid-glass image editor with drop zone, zoom/pan canvas, thumbnail strip, and toolbar.

items.name: glass-image-compare

items.description: iOS 26 liquid-glass before/after image comparison slider with drag divider, floating labels, and drop-to-load support.

items.name: video-player-pro
items.title: Video Player Pro
items.description: Cinema-quality video player with glass control bar, spring physics, custom progress scrubber, inline volume slider, and speed pills with layout-animated indicator.

items.name: hover-play-card
items.title: Hover Play Card
items.description: Video card that breathes — hover to preview muted, click to play with sound. Spring-animated play icon, glass overlay, and progress line.

items.name: cloud-background
items.title: Cloud Background
items.description: A flowing cloud background with WebGL shaders and theme support.

items.name: ripple-distortion

items.description: An interactive image distortion effect with mouse-driven ripples using Three.js.

items.name: particle-text-dots

items.description: Text rendered as interactive particle dots that react to cursor movement, similar to Gemini's background effect.

items.name: dual-tone-rain-background

items.description: A sophisticated rain effect with dual-tone teal-cyan colors and grid overlay.

items.name: magnetic-tabs

items.description: Glass pill indicator that springs between hovered tabs with magnetic attraction and snappier overshoot on selection.

items.name: wheel-pagination

items.description: Vertical drum pagination with scroll wheel navigation, proximity brightness, and spring physics.

items.name: scroll-pagination

items.description: Minimal flip-counter pagination with direction-aware vertical flip, progress bar, and spring physics.

items.name: icon-pagination

items.description: Colorful dot pagination with mouse proximity wave effect, cosine falloff lift, and spring physics.

items.name: gooey-pagination

items.description: Liquid metaball pagination with SVG gooey filter, sliding active indicator, and spring physics.

items.name: stack-pagination

items.description: Physical card stack pagination with depth compression, diminishing scale, and spring physics.

items.name: animated-number-flip

items.description: A card component that displays numbers with smooth flip animations.

items.name: morphing-page-dots

items.description: Morphing pill dots with spring width animation, horizontal drag scrub, and audio ticks.

items.name: sliding-pagination

items.description: Page numbers with sliding pill indicator, proximity brightness, wheel navigation, and spring physics.

items.name: ai-chat-input

items.description: Vanishing chat input with rotating placeholders, pixel-scatter submit, and spring-timed interactions.

items.name: claude-chat-input

items.description: Multi-modal chat input with file uploads, model selector, extended thinking toggle, and spring-timed interactions.

items.name: gooey-dock

items.description: Horizontal dock with proximity-based magnification — items grow as the cursor approaches, spring physics.

items.name: morphing-expandable-menu

items.description: A spring-animated pill that morphs into a dock, then expands into search, music player, timer, or note panels.

items.name: music-player-card

items.description: A rich music player card with album art, action pills, seekable progress, shuffle, repeat, and full transport controls.

items.name: live-waveform

items.description: Canvas-based real-time waveform visualizer with processing animation, microphone input, and stop controls.

items.description: iOS 26 liquid-glass audio pill with canvas equalizer and Web Audio API integration.

items.name: hover-preview-button

items.description: iOS 26 liquid-glass pill with spring-animated hover preview panel.

items.name: confetti-button

items.name: badge-button-combo

items.description: iOS 26 liquid-glass pill with inline chip badge for counts or status labels.

items.name: badge-morph
items.title: Badge Morph

items.name: banner-announcement
items.title: Banner Announcement
items.description: A dismissible announcement banner with multiple variants and action links.

items.name: banner-cookie

items.description: A frosted-glass cookie consent card with rise entrance and shrink-drop dismiss.

items.name: banner-newsletter

items.description: A newsletter banner with Inline Morphing — one pill that reshapes across input, loading, and confirmation.

items.name: banner-countdown

items.description: A countdown banner with Fluid Numerals — odometer-style rolling digits, colon heartbeat, and height-collapse dismiss.

items.name: breadcrumb-separator

items.description: Breadcrumb navigation with customizable separators (chevron, slash, dot, arrow, dash).

items.name: breadcrumb-dropdown

items.description: Inline-expanding collapsible breadcrumb with staggered path reveal.

items.name: progress-button

items.name: icon-label-subtext-button
items.title: Icon Label Subtext Button
items.description: iOS 26 liquid-glass card-button with icon circle, label, and subtext.

items.name: invert-tabs

items.name: drag-and-drop-tabs

items.description: Reorderable tabs with spring physics on drop, staggered cascade, velocity-aware snap, and audio tick.

items.description: Dual-month range picker — click start, hover to preview, click end. Continuous band with smart rounding.

items.description: A depth-zoom calendar — drill from years to months to days with scale-based transitions and staggered grids.

items.name: notification-inbox-popover
